scripts.prebuild-ariel: rm -f target/*.war  && mkdir -p target  && mat-switcher -p tsconfig.json --extra-css 'src/**/*.scss'
scripts.postbuild-ariel: cd dist && zip -r lorelei-ariel.war * && cd .. && mv dist/lorelei-ariel.war target/lorelei-ariel.war
scripts.prebuild: rm -f target/*.war && mkdir -p target && mat-switcher -p tsconfig.json --extra-css 'src/**/*.scss'
scripts.postbuild: cd dist && zip -r lorelei.war * && cd .. && mv dist/lorelei.war target/lorelei.war
